org.artoolkitx.arx.arxj.rendering.gles20

Class ARRendererGLES20

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.artoolkitx.arx.arxj.rendering.ARRenderer
      • org.artoolkitx.arx.arxj.rendering.gles20.ARRendererGLES20
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.Renderer

    public abstract class ARRendererGLES20
extends ARRenderer
    Base renderer which should be subclassed in the main application and provided to the ARActivity using its supplyRenderer method.

    Subclasses should override configureARScene, which will be called by the Activity when AR initialisation is complete. The Renderer can use this method to add markers to the scene, and perform other scene initialisation.

    The render method should also be overridden to perform actual rendering. This is in preference to directly overriding onDrawFrame, because ARRenderer will check that the ARToolKit is running before calling render.
